Marushika is a brand that emerges from the confluence of art and fashion, dedicated to creating wearable art that transcends both place and time. Founded in the UAE earlier this year, we have developed a diverse collection of meticulously curated haute couture pieces that seamlessly blend traditional artistic elements with modern designs.
